Trade/Device Name(s): Tyson Bio HT100-A Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Tyson Bio HT100-C Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Tyson Bio HT100-A Blood Glucose Meter
Tyson Bio HT100-C Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Tyson Bio HT100-A and HT100-C Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for home self-testing of blood glucose in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, or palm; intended for self-testing by people with diabetes at home to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
